entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Windows x86 Checked CLR build using -O2 hits runtime asserts #59845
  • System.Management fails at runtime on Win10/ARM64 #59844
  • Investigate codegen for Vector128.GetUpper #59838
    7.0.0
  • dotnet --info reports duplicates of paths #59833
  • dotnet --info from x64 on ARM64 machine reports both x64 and ARM64 paths #59832
  • System.Xml.XmlTextReaderImpl could possibly benefit from Span #59829
  • LoadFromNativeImagePath needs adjustment for not supporting NI images #59825
  • Reconcile blittable and unmanaged concepts #59824
    7.0.0
  • Make QCalls respect EntryPoint #59823
    7.0.0
  • Avoid running test assemblies in parallel in the same xunit process #59821
    7.0.0
  • Published app silently crashes with: Bundle header version compatibility check failed. #59819
    6.0.0
  • Mono does not implement coreclr_create_delegate hosting API or ComponentActivator #59815
    7.0.0
  • Add AppContext switch to set default MaxConnectionsPerServer #59809
    7.0.0
  • CS0433 The type 'ImageConverter' exists in both.... #59807
    Future
  • Make it unnecessary to add new versions of known distros into the RID graph #59803
  • System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Tests.Atom10FeedFormatterTests.Write_EmptyFeed_SerializesExpected failing in CI #59802
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: StringReader.Position { get; set; } #59801
  • NullReferenceException in BindingDoesNotThrowIfReloadedDuringBinding #59800
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Common #59813
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V2.0-Beta2/b399444/b399444b/b399444b.sh #59794
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: SourceGenerator on byte[] generates array of numbers not base64 string #59791
    6.0.0

Closed

  • Mono does not load native shared libraries next to an assembly with a DllImport to it. #59766
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Provide a way to resolve native P/Invoke method names #59830
  • Obsolete Regex.CompileToAssembly #50535
    7.0.0
  • IconConverterTest.TestConvertTo fail on net48 on non-English Windows #59333
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Arm Neon Intrinsics - float AddAcross is missing, eg vaddvq_f32 #58547
  • Regex SourceGenerator Feature Request: Named Capture Variables #57952
  • Questions about requirements for the new SocketsHttpHandler #58814
    7.0.0
  • Formatting jobs fails in CI #57196
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Tests.ConsoleLifetimeExitTests.EnsureEnvironmentExitDoesntHang #57908
    Future
  • System.Text.Json source generator produces nullability warnings for NRT properties #59464
    6.0.0
  • [System.Net.Quic]Mapping of QUIC_ADDR is incorrect on macOS #58849
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Libraries Regex PGO tests failing with assert #59665
    7.0.0
  • Discussion: Deserialization should not validate the match on the property/field data type #59804
  • [System.Linq] Performance: .ToList() counter-intuitively slower than .ToArray() #58100
    Future
  • [dotnet-dump] dumpobj fails for a stack object from a coredump #58517
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests.CancelTest.ConnectAsync_Cancel_ThrowsCancellationException(server: wss://corefx-net-http11.azurewebsites.net/WebSocket/EchoWebSocket.ashx) #59451
  • Alpine builds use alpine-3.9 docker image that is EOL #56672
    6.0.0
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, runtime, .NET 6 RC 1, validation-runtime-.NET 6 RC 1 #runtime-102558-.NET6RC1 #57711
    6.0.0
  • Surprising performance regression on Unix VMs #59145
    7.0.0
  • Internal CLR errors during delay load when using crossgen2 in composite mode with method layout #59089
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.Tests.Enumeration.SpecialDirectoryTests_Enumerable.SkippingHiddenFiles test fails on Windows 10 2004 #33148
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6 static abstract interface members in combination with static members fail with a MissingMethodException #59432
    7.0.0
  • random.next(low, hi) his is sometimes exclusive and sometimes inclusive. #59788

PullRequests

Created

  • Add back the nethost archive. #59847
    area-Setup, 7.0.0
  • Fallback to read/write if pread/pwrite fails #59846
    area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Produce symbols archives #59843
    source-build, area-Setup, 6.0.0
  • Produce symbols archives #59842
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Improve value numbering for casts #59841
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use `.maxstack 8` in the `System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe` IL code. #59840
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Fix codeql checks #59839
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use the short form of an opcode in `ILGenerator.EmitWriteLine`. #59836
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Syndication test fixes for wasm. #59835
    area-System.ServiceModel.Syndication, 7.0.0
  • More tweaks to regex source generator code #59834
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix Unix ARM64 RtlRestoreContext implementation #59831
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Arm64: Align methods containing loops to 32B #59828
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update workload localization file directory structure #59827
    area-System.Net
  • Remove ObjectDisposedException from the docs of the Task.ContinueWith #59822
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Update WCF dependencies on the compat pack (#59764) #59820
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.0
  • Fix test sensitivity to PKCS7 certificate ordering #59818
    area-System.Security, os-android, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix NRT warnings in source generated code #59817
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Remove assert preventing empty PKCS7 exports #59812
    area-System.Security, os-android, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #59810
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Do not flush serializer buffers before first IAsyncEnumerable element is fetched #59808
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Implement tailcalls #59799
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Don't regress SkipLocalsInit optimization on <= NET6 #59797
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move MakeReproPackage logic to a shared location #59796
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Remove 3 active issues #59790
    area-System.IO
  • JIT: fix register arg size computation for OSR #59789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Expose cross-platform helpers for Vector64, Vector128, and Vector256 #53450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Update DllImportGenerator style to match repo conventions #59753
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Update how-to-debug-dump template #59798
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • SYSLIB0036 - Regex.CompileToAssembly is obsolete #59837
    area-Meta
  • [loader] Look for P/Invoke libs next to the managed assembly #59814
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Leverage `cwde` and `cdqe` for sign extensions on xarch #56172
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Refactor `fgMorphCast` #59713
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update ConfigurationManager #59600
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, Future
  • Obsolete Regex.CompileToAssembly #59734
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Updated ConvertTo_String tests in System.Drawing.Common.Tests for null values #59367
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • RID work for macOS 12 #59066
    area-Host
  • [release/6.0] Define SystemReflectionMetadataStaticVersion to workaround source-build issues. #59782
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix retry when downloading clang tools #59806
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update WCF dependencies on the compat pack #59764
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • fixes to get Quic working on macOS #59728
    os-mac-os-x, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Several improvements to regex source generator #59660
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Fix NRT warnings in source generated code #59755
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Increase timeout for ConsoleLifetimeExitTests.EnsureEnvironmentExitDoesntHang #59811
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Fix regression in Regex lowercasing in parser #59434
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Src gen: use GetBestTypeByMetadataName instead of GetTypeByMetadataName #59774
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 6.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix reusing buffer for debugger #59773
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Build one MonoTargetsTasks assembly for Microsoft.NET.Runtime.MonoTargets.Sdk pack #59720
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove ILStrip temporarily to retain ActiveIssue attributes in release mobile device configuration #59762
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-rc2][wasm][debugger] Fix reuse buffer #59775
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • CI matrix update: add Ubuntu 21.04 #59578
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: add openSUSE 15.2 #59574
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: add Windows.Server.Core.20H2 #59572
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix assert for chain of ASG nodes after tail-calls #59708
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugger tests #59795
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Rev Alpine WithNode from 3.9 to 3.13 #57324
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Fix unboxing during delegate invoke #59749
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • CI matrix change: debian+centos+sles #58988
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Mono]: Fix hfa type field count to handle more cases under LLVM. #59751
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Updated

  • Switch Windows Checked build to `-O2` from `-O1` #59235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Rocky Linux support #59178
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Binder/Loader area #59590
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Merge feature/use-dllimport-generator to main #59579
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Fix BigInteger.Parse returns bogus value for exponents above 1000 #55397
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Updated tests regarding issue #48119 #52994
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
  • [resubmit] Fix bug of FastReducer used in BigInteger.ModPow #55122
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Implement `GT_MUL_LONG` for ARM64 #57926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • System.Drawing.Common.Tests fail ToLogFont_Invoke tests on non English Windows #59328
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
    * NO MERGE *
  • Remove `Net5CompatFileStreamStrategy`. #57735
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Nonzero Exit Code for performance-setup Failures #59483
    tenet-performance
  • Dllimport generator build and test fixes #59658
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Update HostFactoryResolver to account for lack of application name with new host pattern #59743
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • HTTP2 loopback server WaitForCancellationAsync should validate error code sent #59313
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] More typescript conversion #59655
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CodeStyle version #59783
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change profilers to use thread local evacuation counters #59741
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Add beginnings of support for WASI. #59752
    arch-wasm
  • Update Regex source generator to use new GetBestTypeByMetadataName method #59778
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • CI matrix change: Add OSX 12 arm #59085
    area-Infrastructure
  • Loosen strict KeyValuePair deserialization logic (#59450) #59757
    area-System.Text.Json
  • ci test #59222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Issue 55685 processname optimisation #59672
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Don't trim PNSE assemblies and enable trimming for inbox assets on all .NETCoreApp versions #58345
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][interp] Fix unboxing during CALLI #59747
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Refactoring XslCompiledTransform #59475
    area-System.Xml
  • 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #58932
    area-Serialization, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Build improvements based on feedback #59671
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Remove some redundant threading tests, move some cases to libraries tests #59073
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Fix setting creation date for OSX-like platforms #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • fix resolveVirtualMethodHelper #59742
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: better support for patchpoints in try regions #59784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
